_field_real.name: launch radius:wu#each shot will be fired with a random offset in this radius in the x/y plane above the target location
launch z height:wu#strike will be launched at this plane height above the target location
launch warmup:seconds#seconds to wait before launching the strike
launch arrival:seconds#seconds to wait until the launch site marker is removed
launch cooldown:seconds#seconds to wait before the next launch will be ready
launch duration:seconds#how long a launch should take to fire all rounds

_field_long_integer.name: shots per launch#number of rounds to fire per launch

_field_tag_reference.name: fire effect#the effect that will be created when the strike fires.
fire effect (indoor)#the effect that will be created when the strike fires and is indoors
